ygData.subject: Re: Best wizard equipment you have seen or know of? SPOILER
ygData.msgSnippet: spoiler down here.... batskull earrings. +5 int. ah and today i saw a 35th level enchanter (enchant platinum!) with a platinum silver rose quartz VEIL (face
ygData.messageBody:
spoiler down here....













































batskull earrings. +5 int.

ah and today i saw a 35th level enchanter (enchant platinum!) with a
platinum silver rose quartz VEIL (face slot) dunno what the exact stats are
but from what i've seen... enchanted platinum+silver rose quartz = +7 int.
at least that's what the ring is. veil is probably + even more.
